short.ar: تحويل النص إلى كلام بسرعة وسهولة. القراءة بصوت عالٍ من مواقع الويب وملفات PDF والبريد الإلكتروني. كود مفتوح المصدر يراعي الخصوصية.
short.am,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,et,fil: Fast & easy text-to-speech. Read aloud from websites, PDF, email. Privacy-aware, open source code.
short.bg: Бързо и лесно преобразуване на текст в говор. Четете на глас от уебсайтове, PDF, имейл. Код с отворен код, съобразен с…
short.bn: দ্রুত এবং সহজ পাঠ্য থেকে বক্তৃতা. ওয়েবসাইট, পিডিএফ, ইমেল থেকে উচ্চস্বরে পড়ুন। গোপনীয়তা-সচেতন, ওপেন সোর্স কোড।
short.cs: Rychlý a snadný převod textu na řeč. Čtěte nahlas z webových stránek, PDF, e-mailu. Otevřený zdrojový kód s ohledem na soukromí.
short.da: Hurtig og nem tekst-til-tale. Læs højt fra hjemmesider, PDF, e-mail. Privatlivsbevidst, åben kildekode.
short.de: Wähle den Text auf einer beliebigen Webseite aus und lass ihn dir vom Computer laut vorlesen.
short.el: Γρήγορη και εύκολη μετατροπή κειμένου σε ομιλία. Διαβάστε δυνατά από ιστότοπους, PDF, email. Κώδικας ανοιχτού κώδικα με επίγνωση…
short.es: Texto a voz rápido y sencillo. Lectura en voz alta desde sitios web, archivos PDF y correo electrónico. Código fuente abierto y…
short.fa: تبدیل متن به گفتار سریع و آسان با صدای بلند از وب سایت ها، PDF، ایمیل بخوانید. کد منبع باز، آگاه به حریم خصوصی.
short.fi: Nopea ja helppo tekstistä puheeksi. Lue ääneen verkkosivuilta, PDF:stä, sähköpostista. Tietosuojatietoinen, avoin lähdekoodi.
short.fr: Sélectionnez le texte sur n'importe quelle page Web et faites le lire à haute voix.
short.gu: ઝડપી અને સરળ ટેક્સ્ટ-ટુ-સ્પીચ. વેબસાઇટ્સ, પીડીએફ, ઇમેઇલથી મોટેથી વાંચો. ગોપનીયતાથી વાકેફ, ઓપન સોર્સ કોડ.
short.he: טקסט לדיבור מהיר וקל. קרא בקול מאתרים, PDF, דואר אלקטרוני. קוד מקור פתוח מודע לפרטיות.
short.hi: तेज़ और आसान टेक्स्ट-टू-स्पीच। वेबसाइट, पीडीएफ, ईमेल से ज़ोर से पढ़ें। गोपनीयता के प्रति जागरूक, ओपन सोर्स कोड।
short.hu: Gyors és egyszerű szövegfelolvasó. Felolvasás webhelyekről, PDF-ből, e-mailekből. Adatvédelem-tudatos, nyílt forráskód.
short.id: Konversi teks ke ucapan yang cepat & mudah. Membaca dengan lantang dari situs web, PDF, email. Kode sumber terbuka yang…
short.it: Testo-voce veloce e facile. Leggi ad alta voce da siti web, PDF, e-mail. Codice open source rispettoso della privacy.
short.ja: 高速で簡単なテキスト読み上げ。Web サイト、PDF、電子メールから読み上げます。プライバシーに配慮したオープンソース コード。
short.ko: 빠르고 쉬운 텍스트-음성 변환. 웹사이트, PDF, 이메일에서 소리 내어 읽어줌. 개인 정보 보호, 오픈 소스 코드.
short.mr: मजकूर-ते-स्पीच जलद आणि सोपे. वेबसाइट्स, PDF, ईमेल वरून मोठ्याने वाचा. गोपनीयता-जागरूक, मुक्त स्रोत कोड.
short.nl: Snelle en eenvoudige tekst-naar-spraak. Voorlezen van websites, PDF, e-mail. Privacybewuste, open source code.
short.no: Rask og enkel tekst-til-tale. Les høyt fra nettsteder, PDF, e-post. Personvernbevisst, åpen kildekode.
short.pl: Szybkie i łatwe przekształcanie tekstu na mowę. Czytanie na głos ze stron internetowych, plików PDF, wiadomości e-mail. Prywatność,…
short.ro: Transpunerea textului în vorbire rapidă și ușoară. Citiți cu voce tare de pe site-uri web, PDF, e-mail. Cod sursă deschis,…
short.ru: Быстрое и простое преобразование текста в речь. Чтение вслух с веб-сайтов, PDF-файлов, электронной почты. Открытый исходный код с…
short.sk: Rýchly a jednoduchý prevod textu na reč. Čítajte nahlas z webových stránok, PDF, e-mailu. Otvorený zdrojový kód s ohľadom na…
short.sv: Snabb & enkel text-till-tal. Läs högt från webbplatser, PDF, email. Integritetsmedveten, öppen källkod.
short.sw: Haraka na rahisi kutuma maandishi kwa usemi. Soma kwa sauti kutoka kwa tovuti, PDF, barua pepe. Kufahamu faragha, msimbo wa chanzo…
short.ta: வேகமான மற்றும் எளிதான உரையிலிருந்து பேச்சு. இணையதளங்கள், PDF, மின்னஞ்சல் ஆகியவற்றிலிருந்து உரக்கப் படிக்கவும். தனியுரிமை…
short.te: ఫాస్ట్ & సులభమైన టెక్స్ట్-టు-స్పీచ్. వెబ్‌సైట్‌లు, PDF, ఇమెయిల్ నుండి బిగ్గరగా చదవండి. గోప్యత-అవగాహన, ఓపెన్ సోర్స్ కోడ్.
short.th: แปลงข้อความเป็นเสียงได้รวดเร็วและง่ายดาย อ่านออกเสียงจากเว็บไซต์ PDF อีเมล โค้ดโอเพ่นซอร์สที่คำนึงถึงความเป็นส่วนตัว
short.tr: Hızlı ve kolay metinden sese. Web sitelerinden, PDF'lerden, e-postalardan yüksek sesle okuyun. Gizlilik bilincine sahip, açık…
short.vi: Chuyển văn bản thành giọng nói nhanh chóng và dễ dàng. Đọc to từ các trang web, PDF, email. Mã nguồn mở, chú trọng đến quyền riêng…

long.ar,bg,cs,da,de,el,es,fi,fr,he,hi,hu,id,i:
# Usage

1. Select desired text on any web page.
2. Click the Talkie button in your browser bar

You can also select the text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu. This way also works in PDF-files and some special types of pages in Chrome.


# Shortcut keys

A convenient option is to use the Talkie shortcut keys:

- ⌘+Shift+A on macOS
- Ctrl+Shift+A on Windows, Linux, Chrome OS
- ⌘+Shift+1 or Ctrl+Shift+1 to read text from the clipboard in any program (Talkie Premium feature)

If the key does not work, please check that it is not already in use by another extension. How to check or change the Talkie shortcut key:

https://github.com/joelpurra/talkie#usage


# Talkie Premium

# Upgrade to Talkie Premium!

- Select your favorite voice per language!
- Adjust the speed and pitch per language!
- Read text in any program from the clipboard!
- All future features/updates included!

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/talkie-premium/madmpgibncancdmkjflnifcdakndkngo



# Features

☑ Free but your donations are highly appreciated!

https://joelpurra.com/donate/

☑ Lets you listen to the selected text on any part of a page -- a short snippet or an entire news article. Just highlight what you want to hear read aloud and hit play.

☑ Automatically detects the text language per-page, and chooses a voice in the same language to match it.

☑ Privacy aware -- no unnecessary tracking or external services.



# Notes

☑ Please rate the extension and leave feedback.

☑ Does not require any invasive Google Chrome permissions.

☑ Uses your browser's built-in Web Speech API for text-to-speech (TTS) known as Speech Synthesis.

☑ All text and speech is processed internally by your browser. While ultimately depending on your specific browser, all processing is expected to be done on your own machine and not use a server.

☑ Sound is only produced, never recorded.



# Support

Please report any problems you have, especially regarding detecting the right language. Please include relevant information:

☑ Which browser and version you are using.

☑ Which website the problem occurred on. If possible, include the full link.

☑ Which text/part of the website you want spoken.

☑ Which language the text was expected to be spoken in.

☑ Any other information you think might be relevant in tracking down the issue.



# Voices

The voices for each language are provided by your browser. For this reason the list may differ depending on your browser, browser version, operating system, and any other installed extensions/software.

To be able to customize the voice per language, upgrade to Talkie Premium.

Example list of voices available in Google Chrome version 55

· cs-CZ: Zuzana

· de-DE: Anna, Google Deutsch

# Open source

For open source code (GPL-3.0) and more, see the project web page:

https://github.com/joelpurra/talkie

See also additional tools developed by Joel Purra:

https://joelpurra.com/

Talkie is free but your donations are highly appreciated!

https://joelpurra.com/donate/
long.am,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,et,fil:
# Install additional voices

New voices, languages, dialects can be downloaded for FREE for your operating system from for example Microsoft, Apple, and Google. Once installed correctly, Talkie will auto-detect them.

☑ Windows 11: Settings → Time & Language → Language & Region
☑ Windows 10: Settings → Time & Language → Language
☑ macOS: System Preferences → Accessibility → Speech → System voice → Customize...
☑ ChromeOS: Settings → Manage accessibility features → Text-to-Speech voice settings → Speech Engines



# Usage

1. Select desired text on any web page.
2. Click the Talkie button in your browser bar

You can also select the text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu. This way also works in PDF-files and some special types of pages in Chrome.

https://joelpurra.com/projects/talkie/#usage



# Shortcut keys

A convenient option is to use the Talkie shortcut keys:

☑ ⌘+Shift+A on macOS
☑ Ctrl+Shift+A on Windows, Linux, Chrome OS
☑ ⌘+Shift+1 or Ctrl+Shift+1 to read text from the clipboard in any program (Talkie Premium feature)

If the key does not work, please check that it is not already in use by another extension. How to check or change the Talkie shortcut key:

https://joelpurra.com/projects/talkie/#shortcut-keys



# Features

☑ Lets you listen to the selected text on any part of a page -- a short snippet or an entire news article. Just highlight what you want to hear read aloud and hit play.

☑ Automatically detects the text language per-page, and chooses a voice in the same language to match it.

☑ Privacy aware -- no unnecessary tracking or external services.



# Voices

☑ Uses your browser's built-in Web Speech API for text-to-speech (TTS) known as Speech Synthesis.

☑ All text and speech is processed internally by your browser. While ultimately depending on your specific browser, all processing is expected to be done on your own machine and not use a server.

☑ The available voices may differ depending on your operating system, browser, browser version, and any other installed extensions/software.

☑ Custom voices using Speech Application Programming Interface (SAPI) should work, but not all have been tested.

https://joelpurra.com/projects/talkie/#install-additional-voices



# Upgrade to Talkie Premium!

☑ Select your favorite voice per language!
☑ Adjust the speed and pitch per language!
☑ Read text from the clipboard in any program!


# Open source

For open source code (GPL-3.0) and more, see the project web page:

https://joelpurra.com/projects/talkie/

See also additional tools developed by Joel Purra:

https://joelpurra.com/
